COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154
STRING: I spent my time doing nothing, waiting for Arie's letter
to arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a
STRING: Including Saturdays, our days were packed full with
rehearsals, so Fal and I agreed together that we would
have Sundays off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180
STRING: This was mainly a one-sided request from me, however.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196
STRING: Even then, Fal laughed, saying that she could make no
promises about the final Sunday before our recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2
STRING: I gazed at the clock and checked the time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce
STRING: It was still just after five o'clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da
STRING: This was meaningless however, as checking the time
wouldn't do anything for me since I didn't know the
exact time Arie's letter would arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0
STRING: But, I couldn't help but do it, and for some reason or
another I couldn't just sit calmly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a
STRING: [Phorni] “You're checking the time again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240
STRING: [Chris] “...That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e
STRING: [Phorni] “Thinking about Arie's letter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a6
STRING: [Phorni] “I know it's meant to be your off day, but don't
you think you should play your Fortelle just a little?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6
STRING: [Chris] “I'll do that after the letter arrives. Don't worry,
we'll have an ensemble just like we always do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x302
STRING: [Phorni] “That's not what I'm worried about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318
STRING: [Chris] “Hm...? Then, what is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34a
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm just saying that if you're going to sit around
doing nothing, you should just play your Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36a
STRING: [Chris] “By myself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39c
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, it goes without saying that I'll sing for
you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b2
STRING: [Chris] “That's... not much different from our ensembles.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e4
STRING: [Phorni] “You might feel better, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fa
STRING: [Chris] “You're just pretending to be concerned, but all
you want to do is sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42c
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm not pretending to be anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x442
STRING: [Chris] “Whatever. It's probably better than sitting
around wasting time anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47e
STRING: [Phorni] “Ooh, really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x494
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. Playing my Fortelle should help pass the
time, after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b4
STRING: I wasn't that crazy about Phorni's idea, but as I had told
her, spending my time working with Phorni would
probably be better than just sitting around doing
nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4de
STRING: I wondered how many more times she would beg me to
perform ensembles like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x510
STRING: [Phorni] “In that case, let's start before her letter arrives!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x526
STRING: [Chris] “Kind of sounds like the purpose of doing this
has just done a 180...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x558
STRING: [Phorni] “That's okay, as long as I can sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for only thinking about yourself, wow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a0
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm gonna sing now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b6
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f8
STRING: Phorni started singing like she always did, and her
beautiful voice filled the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60e
STRING: The sound from my Fortelle overlaid itself with her
voice, and the two sounds created a complex, perfect
harmony.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x624
STRING: Gently being swayed by the waves of sound, for some
reason I suddenly felt like I wanted to burst into tears.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63a
STRING: Waves of emotion that I was unable to understand
crashed against me, and I had to make an effort just to
keep them at bay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: But even then, the music I played wasn't disturbed, and
it even flowed smoother into its finale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x670
STRING: The music that Phorni and I had just created, was more
emotional than any of the other performances we had
done together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69a
STRING: I wasn't sure from when, but at some point I had closed
my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a8
STRING: I was unable to escape the lingering emotions, move, or
even speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6be
STRING: Trying to find the cause, I focused my nerves and delved
into my memories.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: Phorni was nearby, and even if she had been watching
me, I didn't have the mental leeway to care.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ee
STRING: What was it that just happened to me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x712
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x738
STRING: It wasn't the first time this had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x746
STRING: But, it was the first time that my emotions had been
shaken so strongly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x774
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: ...A voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c2
STRING: A voice that called me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7dc
STRING: A voice that reminded me of something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x800
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x836
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x854
STRING: [Phorni] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86a
STRING: [Chris] “...Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x890
STRING: Hearing her just now, I suddenly felt certain that her
voice was the cause of my condition.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a6
STRING: Or, to be precise, it was the emotion that was
contained in her voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b4
STRING: I recall hearing in a Fortelle lecture, that research was
being performed on the meaning of magic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d8
STRING: The Fortelle, an instrument of magic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e4
STRING: Its origin unknown, the Fortelle was an old instrument
passed down through the ages that required magic to
be played.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fc
STRING: And that magic was “emotion.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90a
STRING: I think it was a scholar or musician from somewhere
that said this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x916
STRING: Perhaps it was a scholar who was a musician, or a
musician who was a scholar.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92e
STRING: The theory wasn't highly supported, but in this very
moment I believed it to be true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x944
STRING: There were accounts that indicated that many Fortelle
players were people with strong emotions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95a
STRING: However, many prominent musicians of all kinds fit that
profile, which didn't help bolster the theory.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x972
STRING: And besides, I never saw myself as having particular
highs or lows in my emotions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98a
STRING: This was the kind of discussion not found in textbooks,
but the kind that a teacher would tell you when
chatting between classes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a0
STRING: So to be honest, I thought little more of it than the fact
that such a theory existed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c4
STRING: But-

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d8
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f6
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0c
STRING: [Chris] “What were you thinking about just now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2a
STRING: [Phorni] “You mean, when I was singing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa40
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5e
STRING: [Phorni] “Who knows? The same things as usual, I
guess?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa74
STRING: The way that Phorni played dumb did not hide the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8a
STRING: [Chris] “Something was different to usual, today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa8
STRING: [Phorni] “...Maybe.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabe
STRING: Her shoulders slumped in a tiny admission of my
observation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: If I were to put the emotions I imagined from her song
into words, I would say it was “parting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae0
STRING: Was it sadness that she infused into her song today?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaec
STRING: Phorni was in front of me, but she wasn't crying, or
showing any other signs of sadness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb02
STRING: But, after finishing everything and thinking of the music
we had just created, as groundless as it was I knew I
wasn't wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb22
STRING: But, even though I now knew, it didn't change the fact
that I had no words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb40
STRING: [Phorni] “Anyway, don't you think the letter would have
arrived by now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb56
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6c
STRING: I had little choice but to follow Phorni's implication, so I
went out to the entrance of my building to collect the
letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbaa
STRING: Upon returning with the letter, Phorni was nowhere to
been seen, and I was greeted by my empty room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc0
STRING: I considered calling her name, but I felt that I just had
to read Arie's letter first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd6
STRING: In the end I said nothing and opened up the envelope,
and it took me a few seconds longer than usual to take
out the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc26
STRING: Dear Chris, is it still raining there as always?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3c
STRING: The weather here is not especially good, however, it is
not so bad either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5a
STRING: In less that just two weeks, it will be time for your
graduation recital, won't it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6e
STRING: The only words I can say right now have little meaning,
and they are most predictable.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8c
STRING: But, please do your best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca0
STRING: I will be thinking of you, and cheering you on from here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb6
STRING: I have too many things to tell you in this letter, so it has
become a little long, but I would be happy if you read it
all the way to the end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcde
STRING: First, about Falsita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf2
STRING: I understand your desire to try to help her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd10
STRING: I can almost imagine you practicing your heart out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2e
STRING: Even though I have hardly ever seen you doing so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd42
STRING: The only thing I can really remember now, is your gentle
face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd56
STRING: You always had that same look, it was truly gentle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd74
STRING: When you were troubled, you would make that face
that said it was nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd88
STRING: You even made the same face when you played music,
when you played the Fortelle with ease.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda8
STRING: When the three of us were going to music school
together, I wasn't able to keep up even though I tried
so hard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd0
STRING: So instead, I just gazed at your face from the side as
you played the Fortelle happily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdee
STRING: I'm sorry, I have gotten sidetracked, haven't I?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe02
STRING: I wanted to write my honest feelings in this letter, but I
just cannot seem to find the right words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe20
STRING: I still have a lot of things I need to write.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4e
STRING: Perhaps Arie needed to get into the right frame of mind,
as she had started writing on a new page.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9c
STRING: In my letters, I wrote many times for you to do what you
think is right, didn't I?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeba
STRING: And your reply was always short, that you “understood.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeda
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeee
STRING: Even if my tactics were a little underhanded...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf02
STRING: Even then, I suppose I wanted you to reply saying that
you wouldn't help her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf20
STRING: The only thing I could ever do, was watch you from far
away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3e
STRING: You always looked truly happy when you performed on
your Fortelle, so I thought that I would be happy with
how things were.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5c
STRING: But, you then told me you had feelings for me, and I
said the same about you-

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7a
STRING: At the time, I thought that would change everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8e
STRING: But, you left and went to music school for three years...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa2
STRING: And as a result, I was left behind once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb6
STRING: I felt like I was left back in that time when I just
watched from far away as you and Torta performed
your ensembles.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd6
STRING: But despite this, I always felt we were connected,
through these letters we write each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff4
STRING: You only had Torta by your side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1008
STRING: But, it's different now, isn't it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101c
STRING: Now you think of someone else, and are doing your
utmost for them, and I am unable to even see it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103c
STRING: The distance between us is too great, your words no
longer reach me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105a
STRING: I can no longer see your feelings in the words written in
your letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1086
STRING: So, that's why I will say it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a8
STRING: Chris, let's go our separate ways.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10bc
STRING: I'm sorry I tested you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d0
STRING: But, that was the only thing I could do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e4
STRING: I know that I am being rather selfish.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f8
STRING: But, even so...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110c
STRING: It was the only thing I could do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1120
STRING: There is still something else I need to write.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1136
STRING: Firstly, please do not come to see me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x114a
STRING: It will only hurt to look at you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115e
STRING: You're probably thinking...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: “If we meet and talk it over, it'll be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1186
STRING: Something like this, I suppose?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119a
STRING: I know, that right now those feelings would be true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ae
STRING: But, you will come to know Falsita more closely, and as
the time you spend with her increases, I am sure you
will be able to forget about me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d6
STRING: Actually, I am sure you will forget me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ec
STRING: I wrote this letter, because that is what I want you to
do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120a
STRING: I wrote this letter, because that it what I truly wish from
the bottom of my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1228
STRING: It is okay if you don't understand right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x123c
STRING: This is something that only I can understand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1250
STRING: Even if I repeat myself, I am sure you won't be satisfied.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1270
STRING: Also, you no longer need to write to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1284
STRING: But, I have the feeling you will do so anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1298
STRING: So if you do, I will keep your letter but not read it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ac
STRING: I am not emotionally ready to just tear it up and throw
it away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ca
STRING: Someday, when I really am, I will read it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e8
STRING: But that someday, will be after a lot of time has passed,
when I know I won't cry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1308
STRING: Even then, I think I will end up crying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1326
STRING: Chris,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133c
STRING: This will be the last letter I write to you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1350
STRING: I've written terrible, one-sided things in this letter, but it
really it the last.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1370
STRING: I am sorry for being selfish and unfair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1386
STRING: But I think that someday, the time will come when you
understand your feelings for Falsita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a4
STRING: When that time comes, if you could forgive me, even
just quietly in your heart, I would be happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c2
STRING: Goodbye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13de
STRING: -Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1414
STRING: I read her letter again a couple of times, and lazed
about in my bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142a
STRING: Phorni hadn't shown herself since last night.
